content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for considering my apartment. The rental price is negotiable, but I am looking for the highest possible price. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to offer 550 Euro per month.

As a student and a responsible person, I want to make sure that the apartment is well-maintained and that I can rely on it being available when I need it. I would also like to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to pay a reasonable price. What is your counter-offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Max. While I appreciate your interest, I am afraid that 550 Euro per month is not within my budget. I would need to charge more to cover my expenses and maximize my gains. May I suggest 650 Euro per month as a counter-offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Can you explain why you need to charge that price?

Also, is there any chance that you could lower the price if I were to sign a longer lease agreement?

As a responsible person, I am willing to pay a reasonable price. I just want to make sure that I am getting a good value for my money.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Of course, Max. The price of 650 Euro per month includes my expenses such as property taxes, insurance, and maintenance costs. I need to charge this amount to ensure that I am able to cover these expenses and remain profitable as a landlord.

As for your question about a longer lease agreement, I would be willing to consider lowering the price if you were to sign a longer lease agreement. However, the length of the lease would depend on my needs and the availability of other properties in my portfolio. I would need to discuss this further with you if we were to come to an agreement on the rental price.

Thank you for your understanding and interest in my apartment. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
